name: Legacy Of Dungeon
description:
An entry for the MiniJam 45: Dungeons, i had around 4-5 hours of time to work on this, started really late, did the best i could (a bit rusty), but anyway, here it is!!

Game also supports Gamepads/Controllers (tested with a x360 Controller).
Controls are:

  • Arrow keys / Left Analog: Move
  • Space / A: Jump/Advance Text
  • X / X: Interact
  • Shift / Right Bumper: Sprint
  • Enter / Start: Fullscreen
  • Esc / Back: Quit Game
